definition: son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)
sound/noise/note (of musical scale)/tone/news/syllable/reading (phonetic value of a character)

sentences.english: Two special units focusing on initial and final consonant clusters.
sentences.chinese: 包含两个特别的单元，提供字首与字尾子音群的练习。

sentences.english: Electronic music and raw sound effects fill the air.
sentences.chinese: 电子音乐和原始的音效在空气中回荡。

sentences.english: He is currently the Head of Composition and Electronic Music at the Hong Kong Academy of Performing Arts.
sentences.chinese: 目前是在香港演艺学院作曲及电子音乐的骨干成员。

sentences.english: Sound contrast pairs, including vowels and consonants, which learners often confuse.
sentences.chinese: 帮助学习者分辨英语中较易混淆的母音及子音。

sentences.english: You know I listen to electronic music all the time from work.
sentences.chinese: 我在工作的时候一直听电子音乐。

sentences.english: The center enrolls postgraduates in the major direction of "Electronic Music Composition".
sentences.chinese: 该中心也招收“电子音乐作曲”方向的研究生。

sentences.english: I have a hard time with electronica.
sentences.chinese: 有段时间我摆弄电子音乐，那让我很难受。

sentences.english: The instrument can also double as an electronic control for a full - size music synthesizer .
sentences.chinese: 它可以兼作一个全套电子音乐合成器的电子控制部分。

sentences.english: I was doing electronic music in tandem with working with the band around '85.
sentences.chinese: 大概在1985年我还在和乐队合作一起做电子音乐。

sentences.english: They've made an enormous contribution to electronic music.
sentences.chinese: 他们对电子音乐贡献巨大。

sentences.english: PSF: What are your thoughts on the techno scene today?
sentences.chinese: 你对当今的电子音乐有何想法？

sentences.english: FM is the world's largest audio-archive focussed on electronic music.
sentences.chinese: FM是世界上最大的致力于电子音乐的音频文件库。

sentences.english: Words that begin with a consonant sound were easier to learn.
sentences.chinese: 以子音开头的字比较容易学。

definition: heavy fall of rain or snow
